Module com.example.rupizza
Package com.example.rupizza

Class SpecialtyPizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizza.SpecialtyPizzaController
public class SpecialtyPizzaController extends Object
SpecialtyPizzaController class handles the events triggered on the Specialty Pizza GUI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    handleOrderButtonAction()
    Handles the "Order" button.
    void
    initialize()
    Initializes event handlers and properties in the Specialty Pizza GUI: setting up and configuring all radio buttons/checkboxes and their toggle groups, using listeners to track changes in text fields, and disabling the order button unless there are valid inputs in each tab.
    private void
    keyReleasedProperty()
    Keeps the "Order" button disabled if the pizza type and size selections are not chosen.
    private void
    updatePizzaInfo()
    Updates the information in the specialty pizza based on specialty pizza classes and user input.

    • SpecialtyPizzaController

      public SpecialtyPizzaController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes event handlers and properties in the Specialty Pizza GUI: setting up and configuring all radio buttons/checkboxes and their toggle groups, using listeners to track changes in text fields, and disabling the order button unless there are valid inputs in each tab.

    • keyReleasedProperty

      private void keyReleasedProperty()
      Keeps the "Order" button disabled if the pizza type and size selections are not chosen.

    • updatePizzaInfo

      private void updatePizzaInfo()
      Updates the information in the specialty pizza based on specialty pizza classes and user input. Price of the pizza is also updated and displayed.

    • handleOrderButtonAction

      private void handleOrderButtonAction()
      Handles the "Order" button. Ensures all user input is valid to activate the button and confirms when pizza is added to order.
